name: Monaco Snacks - Lance and Carol
description:
This game is an adaptation of Tetris with fetish content involving bloated bellies and gas. If you don't like it, I suggest you don't download it. The game contains some very spicy scenes, and is not recommended for children.

This is a story involving two of my characters, Lance; a Formula 1 driver, and Carol; a model. Lance is ready for the Monaco race and Carol will want to enjoy the snacks in the VIP room. Will you be able to help her enjoy these snacks?

So, I want to make it clear that although I made the entire game, the idea of adapting a tetris for these fetishes was created by Hexalt, in the game Yuletide Sophia (game that I enjoyed a lot and thought about do "a version of mine" with my OCs), so I will credit him and leave the links of his social networks.

  •        Hexalt page: (Hexalto)
  •        Hexalt DeviantArt page: (Hexalt)
  •        Yuletide Sophia (Game): (Yuletide Sophia)

And here is the first Bloating Tetris game I made (Bloated Meg).

  •        Bloated Meg (Game): (Bloated Meg)

Thank you for playing! Feel free to post comments and report any bugs! ^^
Support us on Patreon for help us to keep creating bloated belly content: (www.patreon.com/encyclicalapex)
